name: Immortal Token
description: Immortal Rising 2 is a dark fantasy idle RPG game where players - as Immortals - embark on epic quests, forging alliances and battling monsters to save the fallen world from the 7 Demons. Players can choose to enjoy the game either idly by automated battling and grinding process, or immersively by making choices in growing characters and participating in in-game governance. $IMT serves as the core game currency, enabling in-game transactions, governance participation, and staking for rewards. It drives demand through guild competitions, marketplace transactions, and revenue buybacks. Up to 50% of Web2 revenue supports buybacks, and up to 90% of $IMT-based revenue may be burned, ensuring long-term value accrual.
